item.title: C++ Learning Note
item.description: Heap memory and Stack memory Different ways to initialize pointers int * a = &num;Â create a pointer points to num on stack memory Cube * cube = new Cube; create a pointer points to cube on heap memory When deleting a pointer, we need to assign the pointer to nullptr even if the the memory will be released after the function is returned

item.title: Docker Tutorial
item.description: Docker Installation Install docker engine and Nvidia-docker on related platforms. Problem of seeing CUDA11 on docker while the host CUDA version in 11. One of the primary functions of nvidia-docker is to inject the all of NVIDIA driver libs from the host into the container so that the container will run properly with GPUs. One of these libraries is libcuda.so. This is one of the reasons you are seeing nvidia-smi report the driver version from your host.
